long_description: Easy on the eyes and light in the hands, the stylish Scott Remit ski poles offer high-speed performance and easy-to-adjust wrist straps. S2 shaft is manufactured with high-grade aluminum alloy and is computer engineered for excellent strength. Thermoplastic and polypropylene grip offers a lightweight, streamlined profile that makes it easy to do a textbook tuck. Leather straps offer solid style as you plant your poles; rip-and-stick tabs offer quick adjustment. 2.36 in. disc basket blends aerodynamic efficiency and durability; ideal for packed snow. Scott Remit ski poles include the Ice Tip for superb hold on ice.
short_description: Easy on the eyes and light in the hands, the stylish Scott Remit ski poles offer high-speed performance and easy-to-adjust wrist straps.
